title: Metalâ€“organic framework heterojunctions for photocatalysis
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,3002-3035
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00205E, Review Article
Amarajothi Dhakshinamoorthy, Zhaohui Li, Sihai Yang, Hermenegildo Garcia
The present review summarizes the current state-of-the-art in MOF-based heterojunctions in three important photocatalytic processes: hydrogen evolution reaction, CO2 photoreduction and photodegradation of dyes.
